name: My Mom's Spritz Cookies
author: Yoly
summary: A family favorite and it doesn't even have to be Christmas to make them!
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Combine butter and sugar in a bowl
Beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Add egg yolks and vanilla extract
Beat in flour and baking powder
Use your hands to finish mixing if dough does not come together
Add dough to a cookie press and press spritz-shaped cookies onto the prepared baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned, 9 to 11 minutes
Cool on the baking sheets for 2 minutes
Carefully transfer to a wire rack and cook completely
